subject: Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Tests (Drug Use)
Doping (Sports)
organizations: National Center for Drug Free Sport
lead_paragraph: A former vice president said she was terminated after reporting her concerns over the handling of an N.F.L. player’s positive test to her boss at the National Center for Drug Free Sport.
snippet: A former vice president said she was terminated after reporting her concerns over the handling of an N.F.L. player’s positive test to her boss at the National Center for Drug Free Sport.
